adrFormatAddress: 45 Christopher St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: I have been going to Edris for more than fifteen years. She is an artist. Her ability to cut and style curly hair is unparalleled. Edris is also an amazing person and I cherish the time I have with her when I am in her chair.

text.text: I have been going to Edris for more than fifteen years. She is an artist. Her ability to cut and style curly hair is unparalleled. Edris is also an amazing person and I cherish the time I have with her when I am in her chair.

originalText.text: The best care and most knowledge about natural hair care. My wife and daughter would not go anywhere else. They each live 50-80 miles away from nyc! We adore Edris and her fab salon and products. She has routinely cut some of the most fashion forward heads in entertainment and modeling, but she excels with “the rest of us” as well.

text.text: The best care and most knowledge about natural hair care. My wife and daughter would not go anywhere else. They each live 50-80 miles away from nyc! We adore Edris and her fab salon and products. She has routinely cut some of the most fashion forward heads in entertainment and modeling, but she excels with “the rest of us” as well.

originalText.text: I came to Edris Salon with pretty badly heat damaged hair, and I was ready to start my transition process, but not to big chop.  I had an appointment with Alexis and gave her what I thought were pretty impossible instructions: To cut off my heat damage, but still retain length, and to give me a cut that would look great curly and have a good shape, but would also look good should I break down and decide to flat iron.  I got that AND MORE!!  Alexis cut my hair in 4 different states: in its original state when I came in, wet after shampooing, blow dried out, and then wet again. I have never had anyone pay more attention to detail and impart such care into a haircut. She and Shanaya (unsure of spelling) who shampooed my hair also took great care to make sure that I learned how to replicate these results when at home. I learned all about dry shampooing, conditioning in sections, de-tangling as a slow deliberate process, and achieving a defined wash-and-go. All in all, I left SO happy with my cut and feel so ready to start this journey toward rocking my healthier hair in its natural state!  Thanks Alexis!

originalText.text: I had a nice experience at Edris. My color turned out just how I wanted it, and the stylist did a great blowout. I'll definitely be back!

text.text: I had a nice experience at Edris. My color turned out just how I wanted it, and the stylist did a great blowout. I'll definitely be back!

originalText.text: Love this salon, the owner, Edris and her professional and courteous staff. My stylist, Alexis, does a phenomenal cut and style of my natural hair.
